official-title.#text:
To terminate application of sequestration to payment for
		  certain physician-administered drugs under part B of the Medicare
		  program.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail:
,
			 and in addition to the Committees on

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the
			 Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the
			 jurisdiction of the committee concerned

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Termination of
			 sequestration to payment for physician-administered drugs under part B of the
			 Medicare program

text.#text:
Notwithstanding the
			 presidential order issued on March 1, 2013, under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the budgetary
			 resources sequestered under that order for payments for drugs and biologicals
			 under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 251A of the Balanced
			 Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be
			 available for obligation for drugs and biologicals furnished on or after the
			 date of the enactment of this Act in the same amount and manner as if such
			 order had not been issued.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1847A of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:251A

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
as may be
			 required to reimburse for the reductions in the payments made under such order
			 for drugs and biologicals described in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and furnished on or after
			 April 1, 2013, and before the date of the enactment of this Act.

text.#text:
Notwithstanding such presidential order and
			 such

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or any other Act (other than under this
			 section) or as requiring or authorizing the reduction of other payments, under
			 such title or otherwise, by virtue of the application of this section.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title
			 XVIII of the Social Security Act

text.#text:
Nothing
			 in this section shall be construed as affecting any other payments under
